title: Truman vs Stalin
creator_credit: Laurence Neiman, David L. Wolper and Wolper Productions
brief_description: Discusses the debates, concessions and commitments that were made by Stalin, Truman and Churchill at the Potsdam Conference in Germany, 1945.
